speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0169/2008 ) by Zita Gurmai, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, entitled Towards Europe-wide Safer, Cleaner and Efficient Mobility: the First Intelligent Car Report ( 2007/2259(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0169/2008 ) by Zita Gurmai, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, entitled Towards Europe-wide Safer, Cleaner and Efficient Mobility: the First Intelligent Car Report ( 2007/2259(INI) ).
agenda_item: Towards Europe-wide Safer, Cleaner and Efficient Mobility: The First Intelligent Car Report (debate)
